issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I downloaded the studio the other day and have been unable to get it to work. I have no idea what exactly is going wrong. 

Im using a Mac OS X 1.5.8 and downloaded the latest version of Titanium Studio.

The last time I installed it the following error messages appeared:
1)During the studio configuration

An internal error occurred during: "Loading bundle: /Volumes/Titanium Studio/Titanium Studio/plugins/com.appcelerator.titanium.core_1.1.0.1337702423/bundles/titanium_desktop.ruble". null argument 

An internal error occurred during: "Loading bundle: /Volumes/Titanium Studio/Titanium Studio/plugins/com.appcelerator.titanium.core_1.1.0.1337702423/bundles/titanium_mobile.ruble". null argument

2)When installing the Android SDK

NLS missing message: MobileSDKConfigurationProcessor_installingAndroidMessage in: com.appcelerator.titanium.mobile.portal.processor.messages

3)After the android SDK somehow is installed even with that error, and I attempt to run a Hello World app and get the following message:

An internal error occurred during: "Launching Android Emulator". java.lang.NullPointerException

-Ive checked the path to the SDK in preferences, its good. Deleted all emulators, re-installed completely... At this point I'm lost. Nothing seems to be working as it should!

Best

Alfonso Velasco

comments.body: Alfonso--Can you please attach you log file? (Help menu > Titanium Studio > View Log file?)
